titles.title: Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2009
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain disclosures of cell phone numbers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/9/2009--Introduced.
Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2009 - Amends the federal criminal code to impose a fine and/or prison term of up to six months for knowingly disclosing a wireless subscriber's unlisted cell phone number to another, for gain, without the express permission of such subscriber.
